page.title: 02An 11 year old school day
page.content:
I begin the day at{7 o'clock}in the morning. I have to go to{school}at 8.10am. First I get dressed, then I have a wash. After this I have my breakfast. At 8.10 the{mini bus}picks me up out side my house. When I arrive at school a bell rings which tells us to line up and walk quietly into school. The Headmaster{Mr Houghton teaches the{third}and{fourth years {Miss Strubbe}teaches the{first}and {second years,}and{Mrs Moate}teaches the{infants. }There are{49 children in the school. We finish school at 3.05pm. I go home on the mini bus. I get home at 3.30pm and watch television until 4.00pm when I have my tea. I go to{bed}at{10.00PM
Sarah Diaper
